name: @opengovsg/ts-template
description: A template for most TypeScript projects in OGP

scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix client install
scripts.dev-start: env-cmd concurrently "npm run on-server -- dev" "npm run on-client -- start"
scripts.lint: npm run on-server -- lint && npm run on-client -- lint
scripts.lint-fix: npm run on-server -- lint-fix && npm run on-client -- lint-fix
scripts.test: npm run on-server -- test && npm run on-client -- test

author: Open Government Products, GovTech Singapore (https://open.gov.sg)

hooks.pre-commit: npm run on-server -- lint-staged && npm run on-client -- lint-staged
